评论详情: Soft, comfortable, cute!

LOVE these tops. Not only are they very soft and comfortable, the cut out in the back makes it super stylish. Originally I ordered two. Not sure how I would like them. I have now ordered this top in five different colors. Sizing is very accurate. They wash very well, no bleeding. I dry them slightly and take them out while they’re damp and lay them flat to dry. Wrinkling does not seem to be a problem either. Very pleased with this top. I highly recommend, especially for the price. I have some from Athleta that were much more expensive but these are my favorites.

评论概述: Nice quality, just wasn't into the style
评论详情: Granted, this is a nice shirt. The fabric is soft and comfortable, and the cut is flattering. However, I can personally vouch that it's not a great yoga shirt, as opposed to what the product description states--it was constantly falling down into my face whenever I did a downward dog in yoga class. And for someone who is a little self-conscious about their belly, this was less than ideal.  The other little gripe I had is that the sleeves are snug and trap in heat, while the back is very open and breezy. So it's hard to find that perfect temperature range where this shirt is comfortable to wear.  The shirt did fit me well, but I ended up giving it away, because of the reasons I've mentioned, after owning it for a few months. (For reference, I bought a size large, I'm 5'8'', my weight is 170 lbs., and my bust/waist/hip measurements are 38", 33", and 43", respectively.)
This was purchased as a gift and I have seen my daughter in law wear it numerous times and we don't see her regularly
This shirt is super soft and comfortable. I love the breathable open back and the way it drapes.  True to size

I am 5’6”, 128 pounds with a fairly large chest. I could’ve bought a small I think but I don’t like things super short so I bought a medium. It fits great, it’s a little flowy, The sleeve length is perfect and the fabric is so buttery soft and stretchy . I got this on sale and will definitely order more colors.  If you don’t like things as flowy and you’re in between sizes I would recommend purchasing the smaller size.
Great shirt… however it is so much bigger than I expected. I am usually a larger and this is huge. I would order a size smaller.
Love the deep dark color, it wrinkles easily but the material is amazing! Didn’t shrink after the first wash! I have a few of these to throw on after a workout.

评论概述: Color is not even close to photo
评论详情: Ordered this thinking it would be a purple-pink color but what arrived was a bright fuchsia. Disappointed with the color but it’s fine. Fits good and it’s alright.
Super cute, comfy and fresh!
Did not arrive on time
It’s a good top, but not worth the price. I’d order more if the price matched it’s quality.

I am a big fan of soft flowy and breathable workout shirts. I ordered a small and it fits perfect.  I am 5'2, 105 lbs.  Its super soft, breathable and flowy.  The open back shows off your sports bra.  The sleeve length and overall length is perfect for me.  It washes and dries well too! It does not stick to you when you sweat, nor can you see through it. It's so versatile.  I wear it for everyday wear and to work out! I will be ordering this shirt in other colors. Highly recommended basic everyday/yoga shirt.
Wrinkled mess with puckered collar after one wash. Definitely not worth the price. Also arrived out of the package smelling of chemicals so washing before wearing is advisable.
I love the flattering fit, feel and overall look of this top. It instantly became my favorite workout top after trying it on. I feel cute and comfortable wearing this to the gym and around town.

This is a great airy and light workout top. Only giving 3 stars because it was described as a yoga top, which is what I bought it for.  Unless you wish to expose yourself during every downward dog, you'll need to tuck it in, which is not very comfortable or attractive. Regular gym stuff yes. Yoga, no.
Cool and comfortable.

评论概述: I'm keeping it but the shoulder seam is strange
评论详情: I'm 5'7" 128 lbs and a small fit great. I mostly bought it to show off a new cute sports bra :) After I put it on, I thought of buying more colors bc truly it is so comfy and flattering, but the shoulder seam is half way down my bicep. You have to look really hard in the product images. It looks like it was supposed to be a short sleeve shirt and they sewed on sleeves as an after thought. However, it is fitted in the arms, soft, breezy but not baggy, and rests nicely on the hips so I am keeping it.

When I got it my mind was blown away. Amazon fabric. I used it right away. Went to the gym and then some water got on it when I was washing my face. The spot that was wet went lighter than the rest and got wrinkly. So weird  I won’t be using it for the gym again. Just to stay at home. Also it is made of cotton/ polyester whatever it is. When it touches water and you rub it you can see the little fabric fibers
Amazing
Just a very bland shirt
I bought the small . I am 5’5” and 120lbs. It’s so cute and great quality. Totally recommend.
I wanted something long sleeve to work out in and the back being open is cute and allows for ventilation. 4 stars just because it's nothing special, but it's comfortable.
I ordered three of these, and absolutely love them. They are exactly as described and fit well. The fabric is very lightweight.
Super soft and comfortable. I had to order a second one in another color, this top is so great. I’m sure I’ll live in it!

评论概述: Love this shirt for working out.
评论详情: I tend to wear tanks and short sleeve when I work out because I run warm. The open back makes this top airy and great for working out. It’s comfortable and fits great.

I purchased this as a layer for my daughter who is a competitive dancer. In the convention rooms, it's nice to have layers that you can add or remove quickly during water breaks.  This layer is thinner and a nice addition with the slit in the back for a flowy vibe.
I love the back to this top. It’s breathable and and fits great. I bought black but will definitely try some more colors.
Wonderful fit, soft material and perfect of pilates or yoga.

I love how this top drapes on my frame.  This fabric loosely clings which is important if you have athletic shoulders or a fuller bust but generally have a lean body.  Without the drape, some tops can be so boxy and unflattering.  I also love the softness of this material. It washes beautifully as well. I liked it so well I bought a few.The material also moves nicely with you through your Yoga practice...the only really silly drawback for me is when in "down-dog", it falls so fully to the front that with my head between my arms I cannot see my toes...which is not that big of a deal. 😆🙏🏻One more thing. The open back is not too open. It has just enough of an opening to have your cute athletic bra peek through the most flattering part of your back between your shoulder blades.
I love these shirts. They fit great.

评论概述: Flattering w/out showing too much skin
评论详情: I love this shirt! I bought it in the maroon and green, it’s great for working out and I wear out and about also. Toss on some jewelry and you can dress it up for date night. The back is open but just your lower back shows depending on what you are wearing underneath. I typically have a sports bra.
Love everything about it. The color is fabulous
Shirt is cute. The material is slightly heavier than I expected. It's very soft. I haven't worked out in it because im afraid of sweat stains lol but very comfy hang out shirt with a bralette

I REALLY love this top. What I don't love is playing the game of getting it out of the dryer before it wrinkles. However, the fabric is silky soft and cozy. It may be a little heavy for summer days and bounce too much for my liking during high intensity cardio, but outside of that is a lovely top for in and out of the gym. 5'8, 129lbs, 27 waist, 32d bra size and size small sits on hips and has a loose, but not too loose fit.

I have this shirt in many other colors. I ordered large because it shrinks a little in the wash. I wear it to the gym and looks great with strappy bralettes or sports bras of your choice..Great for bike riding too…
Shirt if very light weight.  It washed well, but took forever to dry.

Just buy it! Won’t be disappointed. The fabric feels amazing on the skin. A nice amount of back showing through. I’m 5’ even around 125 pounds and a medium fit me perfect. The bottom of the shirt come down to my waistline.
Very comfy shirt

I really like this top. I didn’t really buy it for working our, more for athleisure wear! If you want it roomy, size up. I got a small and it fits great but I had no more wiggle room and will not dry it!

The top isn’t as oversized as the picture shows. It’s not quite cropped but doesn’t quite hit the top of my hips. The fabric is heavy and doesn’t feel breathable but seems to be made out of athletic material. It’s like the top is confused as to whether it’s a workout top or a going out top but doesn’t seem to fit either

I have purchased similar shirts at Lululemon and Athleta but they stopped carrying them. If you know, the cost was almost 3x as much as these. The material on this shirt is awesome-soft and stretchy. I am 5’3, 150, 36C and ordered a medium. Fits perfectly. I ordered 3 more! 3 more for the cost of 1 at Lululemon

评论概述: Best for all day any day wear!
评论详情: I absolutely love the material feels like you’re being hugged and by just a soft silk setting layer even though it is not it says wonderful you can work out in it you can run your daily errands in it and you can be nice and cozy at home by the fire in it it’s not it’s absolutely lightweight and warm when need be!

Surprisingly great.  The sleeves are long enough for my long arms. The length of the top hits the top of my hip which shows off any cute detail I have on my high-waisted leggings. The tailoring is quite flattering and the peekaboo opening in the back lays perfectly.  It's lightweight and breathable, but wrinkles fairly easily.  All in all, definitely buying a couple more.

评论概述: very soft and comfy! Good for any time of year/weather
评论详情: I seriously love this top. It looks great and fits well, although it did shrink a little in the dryer (granted I didn't read the label so if I wasn't supposed to put them in the dryer in the first place, my bad) and it is so SO soft! One of the comfiest shirts I own! Great for transitioning from cool to cold weather. The pictures are accurate so what you is what you'll get. Im considering buying one or two more (i got the red color)

You will want to go a size up! The right size for me was fine but not as lose fitting at the model in the picture! The material is nice, not very breathable. Only air that gets in will be via the back! It’s a beautiful green color! I actually used it as a dressy/casual shirt.

These are nice to go over your work-out top.  It fit well.  The fabric is okay.  I bought one in gray and one in white.  The gray one looks much better.  The white one looks a little cheap because the fabric is thin.  But I'm happy with the tops.

I was looking for long sleeved workout shirts. This one was perfect! I ordered an XL for a loose fit and it felt fine. Material is good and felt comfortable. I wore this to spin class and got a lot of compliments. Only thing i could say is it’s a little short, if i raise my hands up the shirt lifts and shows a little mid-drift, but I didn’t mind it at all. I will be ordering more.

The shirt is super cute. Material is great. Sooo soft. BUT it fits a little more on the snug side and I even sized up. I would suggest to size up at least 2 sizes if you are looking for a looser fit. For reference, I am 5’3” and I weigh around 180lbs. I got a XL and feel like I should have gotten an XXL

Pros: Fits as expected Super soft Seems fade resistant (heather gray color) Very comfortable and perfect amount of stretch  Cons: Uncertain if the dabric will "pill" after multiple washes....I think it may based on 4 washes to date.
The shirt is very soft and comfortable.  It was shipped out very quickly and received on time.  Would buy from again!
Great material. Super cute concept but I had to tie it up more in the back because it was too baggy.

I bought this for casual wear in White. It feels great on!! Hangs nicely. Pairs nicely w/any kind of shorts pants. Did not like it with a skirt. The first time I wore it I got ketchup on it (ugh). I was amazed the stain came out by using dawn soap & hand washing. Since then I wash in cold water & hang-dry. Plan on ordering the black. The fit is petite which I like!!

评论概述: Very nice soft fabric and flattering on

I snipped the seam at the back bottom and used it for my disabled mother when she was bedridden. It easily fit onto arms and over the head without having a back to fuss with.  Soft and comfortable.
This is my new favorite long sleeve shirt! Fit is perfect, so cute and comfortable. I’m buying different colors.

When I first pulled them out of the package I thought they’d be too big on me. Actually they were perfect, not too big and not too small. Grateful it wasn’t a crop top hit also not too long. Loved loved the fabric! I wish this fabric came  in different styles.
For a large, it wasn't too big.  I wish it had been a little longer, but that is just me.  Comes right to my natural waist line, and I wish it had come down to the top of my hips.

I’m 5’6”, 122 lbs, purchased my normal size Small. Personally I think it’s too loose to be flattering and the material is much thicker than expected. 评论概述: Soft, lightweight and just the right amount of sexy
评论详情: Love this material. Its soft and comfortable. I ordered the Medium and am 5'6" 140lbs and its loose around my midsection which I was looking for. The sleeves are long enough to go past my wrists if I wanted them to but snug enough that they stay pushed back when I need them outta the way. It does rise up when I have my hands over my head but that doesnt bother me. I wear this to the gym or just lounging around the house and an very happy with this purchase.

评论概述: back is longer than the front
评论详情: the back of the shirt is quite longer than the front, which makes it look weird. it’s also generally longer than i expected it to be. the sleeves and chest fit fine, the rest is a little too loose. the material is extremely nice though. i would advise you to size down. i’m 5’3, 130lbs and have a very short torso.

评论概述: You can order what ever size you normally wear in shirts
评论详情: I absolutely love this top. I ordered my regular size which is a medium and it fit perfectly. I can wear it either alone with any sort of sports bra or over top a workout shirt as an extra for warmth. I love the shirt so much I will be buying more in different colors. The other thing I like about this top is the length of it. So many shirts go over your butt today, this one perfectly stops Before that point.

I. Love. This. Top! The open back design is so cute and simple but is perfect for those days when I am wearing my cuter sports bras or lacy bralettes. The shirt is so soft and comfortable, easy to wash, and flowy/not staticky. I would say it is pretty true to size, too. It is not form fitting but nicely fitted, with enough wiggle room to do whatever activities you have planned.
The shirt shipped very quickly, is made of great material. A lot of stretch which means a lot of comfort while working out or just wearing with a pair of jeans.

This top is made well and the material is high quality.  It a loose fitting top and very comfortable. The material is medium texture and well made. Doesn't feel cheaply made. Will purchase another top in a different color.
Nice material, order the smaller if between sizes.

I ordered a small and it fits perfectly. I love the material too - not too hot or cold and just a tiny bit stretchy so I can look at my watch fitness. I’ve order another but will definitely order more because it’s superb. The fit length wise is perfect and not too ballon-y like other tops. It’s a definite keeper!
Tge fabric is nice quality. I bought this for yoga meditation. Love it. Fits perfect
Love it! It’s so cute and it’s cozy!

This too has a different material than the other colors. The dark charcoal grey is very itchy and more of a cotton stiff material. I was not a fan but still wore it to workout. I have the same too in black and light grey. They fit different and more of a stretch type material that DOESNT ITCH. I would not recommend getting the charcoal grey shirt but I love the light grey and black shirt.

True to size and soft. I need long sleeves and am pleased to find something with character! Ordered another color!
Super comfy and light weight!
The workout top is beautiful. Fits great. If there is one flaw, the back opening was much more than I realized. For me, I will have to add a cc ardigan out in public.
The fabric has a very nice drape to it. It’s a nice weight, very soft. I may order in another color. I wish this was offered in a short or 3/4 sleeve as well.
I love that these give a little extra edge to a workout or tennis outfit. Purchased 4, and quality is also great.

I gifted this to my sister and she wears this all the time. I got her a large. She is 5’3” 160 lbs. I have the same one and it is super soft and a great quality material. Ordered a large for a flowing look. Size down if you want it to fit tighter
